name: Crmdemo
tagline: This is a repo for a small demo of CRM
body:
### Welcome to Page of Demo CRM.
Demo CRM is designed for a small business tracking of clients, agreements and payments.
It has two main parts

# Currently code at heavy refactoring, so take a look at screenshots!

### 1. Clients part
![Piccy.info - Free Image Hosting](http://i.piccy.info/i7/2ef164636ad55e55e17e6713d3e21202/4-66-417/64104994/client_screenshot1_800.jpg)

Client can
* View his agreements in short or extanded (full details)
* View status of agreements - payed or not
* View his payments in short or extanded (full details)
* View his info

### 2. User (employee) part
![Piccy.info - Free Image Hosting](http://i.piccy.info/i7/f214f3fc4c17e6a702aa8752524b3576/4-66-417/5258517/user_screenshot1_800.jpg)
User can
* View, add, remove his clients
* View, add, remove agreements of his clients
* Attach/detach existing payments to agreements
* View banks accounts info
* etc

User interface is designed with help of Wordpress Bootstrap Framework and heavy usage of JavaScript and jQuery.

This Demo shows my skills of:
### Back-end
This project uses JavaEE with servlets, MySql and hibernate and some additional technologies.

### Front-end
Front-end uses next web-technologies:
* HTML
* CSS framework Twitter Bootstrap
* Javascript
* JQuery
* AJAX
